column4:
Mon is a currency I invented to
destabilize the market and fight the
establishment!
Just kidding, there is no establishment in
Hyrule! I just love monsters so much that
I turned them into money!
Here's the deal: if you bring me
monster parts, I'll exchange them for
mon.
I'm the only business in Hyrule that
accepts mon as payment!
Pretty exclusive, eh?
Anyway, you can spend your mon on
various types of monster gear that I've
created based on my research.

column3: そうですか… それは残念です
column4: I see... That's a shame.

column4:
The stone colossus... More commonly
known as the Stone Talus.

They masquerade as normal rocks,
burying themselves in the ground.
Stubborn is an understatement...
According to the most recent count,
there are 40 of them in Hyrule.

column3:
あなた これまで全40体のうち体の
イワロックを倒しましたね！
column4:

しかし体の一部に色の違う場所があるはずです
そこを狙えば…
column4:
*sniff sniff*


You...you haven't killed any
Stone Taluses yet?! Whew... You have
your work cut out for you.
Let me give you a hint: these guys are
literally made of stone, so you can't just
swing blindly and hope to take them out.
But one part of their body is a
different color. If you hit them there,
your fortune may improve.

column3:

column4:

Stone Talus!

Oh, you are FRAGRANT, my friend.
It smells like there's a Stone Talus
standing right in front of me!

column4:
Monster parts are the things that
monsters drop when they expire.

You know—horns, fangs, eyes...
The color and size may differ a bit,
but they're all monster parts.
The more rare they are, the more mon
they're worth!

The giant sand beast... More commonly

They're giant monsters that live in the

According to my sources, there are only
four of them in Hyrule.

*sniff sniff*

I've noticed that they're very sensitive to

If you scare them from a distance with
a big noise, maybe you can stun
them long enough to take them out.

Ooh. OOOOOOOH!

The stone colossus? The forest giant?

私…"魔物が好き過ぎて

さぁ…次は どこの村を拠点に
魔物調査 しましょうかね…
カカリコ村かハテノ村…
いやいやリトの村やゾーラの里も捨てがたい
足を延ばしてゲルドの街かウオトリー村
近いとこならアッカレ湖か…
あぁ～～っ！
考えただけで ゾクゾクしてきました
それでは魔物調査の旅に行ってきますね！

また どこかの村で夜にでもお会いしましょう
column4:
I just love the field of monster research
so much that I decided to open a shop
all about monsters!
I call it...Fang and Bone!


I travel all around Hyrule in search of
rare and exciting monster parts. But I'm
not sure which village I should visit next.
Kakariko Village or Hateno Village?
Though Rito Village and Zora's Domain
are also good options. Hmm...
I suppose I could go all the way to
Gerudo Town or Lurelin Village.
But Lake Akkala is much closer.
RAWWWWWRGH! I'm so excited I can
hardly contain myself!

I can't just sit around while there are
monsters to be studied! I'm off!

I'm sure we'll meet again in some village
during the night. Fare thee well!

column3: ヒギーーッ！
column4: HOOOOOOOYAG!

申し訳ございません
マモノショップは ただ今準備中なんですよ…

Yes. I'm opening a monster shop called
Fang and Bone. But I'm still preparing
for my grand opening.

私も追跡中なのですが なにせ相手は強大

なので代わりに そいつらを見つけ

あなたに付着した臭いや体液から

それではお願いしますよ…
column4:
I'm currently after them myself, but
they're just so big! I can't even get near
them...
So could I ask you to find them and,
uh, harvest their materials? I'm talking
all of them.
That way, I'll be able to analyze the scent
of their fluids that will inevitably stick
to your body during battle.
That will allow me to determine their
habits, behaviors, and overall qualities.

I'm counting on you...

You don't have to suffer in silence

every time you kill a monster.
Destroying monsters for their materials
is soul-crushing work, but it must be
done.

column3:
新しいマモノグッズを開発しました！
その名もズバリ！
ボヨーンハンマー！！

小振りな魔物なら殴るだけで
ボヨーン！ と遠くに吹っ飛ばせる代物です
戦うまでもない邪魔な魔物を追っ払うのに
非常に便利ですよ！
column4:
I've developed a new piece of
monster gear! I call it the...

Spring-loaded hammer!


Whack a small monster with this thing,
and...BOING! It'll launch the monster
into the distance!
It's really useful for getting rid of pesky
monsters that you don't feel like fighting.
Plus, it's just fun to use!

column3:
久々にマモノグッズを開発しました！
その名もズバリ！
リザルフォスマスク！

リザルフォスって
ホントに うっとうしいですよね…
泳いでいるかと思えば
とんでもない速さで襲ってきたり…
中には周りの風景に合わせて
擬態してるヤツも居ますからね
そんなトリッキーな所が魅力なのですが
殆どの旅行者は手を焼いているようです
なので ですよ！ヤツが遠方に見えた時
リザルフォスマスクをかぶれば なんと
ヤツらは あなたを仲間だと思い込み
やり過ごす事が できるんです！
column4:
It's been a while, but I've developed a
new piece of monster gear! I call it the...

Lizalfos mask!


Those Lizalfos can really be a pain to
deal with when you're injured.

Just when you think they're sleeping,
they attack you without a moment's
notice!
Some of those scaled sneaks can even
use camouflage to blend in to their
surroundings!
But if you wear this Lizalfos mask, they
will think you're one of them and they'll
ignore you!

column3:
新しいマモノグッズを新開発しましたよ！
その名も名付けて…
ライネルマスク！

ライネルとは半身半馬の魔物です
獰猛で ものすごく強いんですよ
色んな武器も使いこなすので まさに最強！
その手の付けられない感じが素敵なんですよ
実は私も魔物調査中 そのライネルに
何度か やられかけた事がありましたが…
まぁ それは置いておいて！

その世にも恐ろしい魔物 ライネルの
目をあざむくことができる究極のマスクです！
さぁ早く お手に取ってご覧ください
column4:
I've developed a KILLER piece of
monster gear! I call it the...

Lynel mask!


Lynels are monsters that are half man,
half horse. They are absolutely vicious.

They wield a multitude of weapons with
incredible strength and grace.

If I was a monster, I'd want to be a Lynel
for sure!

Actually, I was almost killed by a Lynel while
designing this mask. It was one of the best
moments of my life...
Anyhow... This incredible mask can 
fool Lynels into thinking you're one of
them!
Try it for yourself! It's quite a rush.

column3:
やりましたよ お客さん！
私すごいマモノグッズを開発しちゃいました！
あぁ恐ろしい…ついに私魔物の力を
我がモノにしてしまったかも…
究極の魔物なりきり衣装！
その名も…
ダークシリーズ！！

これさえ着れば あなたも魔物！
エンジョイ嫌われライフ！！
…

うーん…まあアレですよアレ…
コスプレってやつですよ！
あ…でも夜になるとちょっとだけ
機敏に動けたりしますよ
なんでそうなったのか わかってませんが…
column4:
I'VE DONE IT! I've developed an
unprecedented piece of monster gear!

I can't believe I was able to pull this off!
I'm actually a bit terrified of myself right
now... 
*ahem* 
I present to you the ultimate in monster
camouflage! I call it...
the dark series!


Wear this, and you will become a
monster yourself! I hope you like being
hunted for your organs!
...


Or you could just, you know, think of it
as a costume.

Oh, yes. And when night falls, you might
just be able to move a little bit faster.

Not sure how it turned out that way, but I'm not
complaining...

column3:
マモへの換金 ありがとうございました

それでは改めましてマモノショップの開店です
御用件を お話し下さいね
column4:
Thank you for converting your monster
parts into mon.

Now then, how else can Fang and Bone
serve you today?

column3:

column4:

Now then, how can Fang and Bone

column3:
今日はお店の準備が整ってます
早速商売といきましょうか
…っと その前に

あなた当店…
マモノショップのご利用は初めてですよね？
ご新規のお客様は まず魔物素材を
マモに換金してもらわねば なりません
column4:
My monster shop is now open for
business!

Seeing as how you're a first-time
customer here at Fang and Bone...

our first order of business will be
converting your monster parts to mon.

column3: ジャジャジャ～～ン！！
column4: Da da...DAAAAAAAA!

を全部ですね？

column4:
I can't make any more trades right now,
but thanks for being such a great
customer.

column3:
もう在庫が すっからかんです…
また作ろうと思っている物 ご覧になります？
column4:
You bought out my entire stock! But I
can still show you the type of stuff I
carry, if you'd like.

column3:
なぁんだ～…あなたでしたか
びっくりしちゃいましたよ
column4:
Ahhh...it's just you.
You startled me.

column3: ひゃぁ！あなたでしたか！
column4: AHHHH! Oh, it's just you.

column3: なんだか とてつもなく邪悪な視線を感じる…
column4:
I feel like I'm being watched...by a pair
of tremendously evil eyes.

column3:
我ながら なんて恐ろしい装束でしょう…
これで驚かない人間はいないでしょうね
column4:
That's a pretty terrifying outfit, if I do say
so myself. It could make even the bravest
merchant cry for his mummy.

column3:
おやおや？！
何とも香ばしい臭いがするじゃないですか！
さては相当な魔物体験をされて来ましたね？
…うらやましいです
では改めまして…
column4:
Ahhh! That heavenly smell...


Could it be that you've been mingling
with monsters?

I must admit I'm a bit jealous.
